name: NU_OrganismsTestsInSpecimenFromWoundByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: NU_Organisms (Tests in Specimen from Wound by Culture and Identification Method
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of organisms in specimens from wound sites by culture),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: bacteria, virus, fungus, culture),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
